content.html: Mastodon isn't the solution, it's just another thing with different problems. Each instance will have to defend itself from a court order if people want info, also it's not secure as you'd think. Take care of what you put out there
content.value:
Mastodon isn't the solution, it's just another thing with different problems. Each instance will have to defend itself from a court order if people want info, also it's not secure as you'd think.

Take care of what you put out there
